mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study (title, create_user_idx, min_count, max_count, deadline, start_date, end_date, open_kakao, purpose, is_online, place, extra_info, apply_condition, detail_info, study_status, photo) VALUES (#{title}, #{create_user_idx}, #{min_count}, #{max_count}, #{deadline}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{open_kakao}, #{purpose}, #{is_online},#{place}, #{extra_info}, #{apply_condition}, #{detail_info}, '모집중', #{photo} )
